languages.text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Вигдис, застигнутая врасплох вашим вопросом, не сразу находит слова для ответа.{/n} "Вокс-система функционирует без нарушений, никто из экипажа не сообщал о проблемах связи... Прошу, позвольте мне провести калибровку системы в вашем присутствии — у вас не останется сомнений в ее исправности".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Вигдис, застигнутая врасплох вашим вопросом, не сразу находит слова для ответа.{/n} "Вокс-система функционирует без нарушений, никто из экипажа не сообщал о проблемах связи... Прошу, позвольте мне провести калибровку системы в вашем присутствии — у вас не останется сомнений в ее исправности".

languages.text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан..." {n}Вигдис, застигнутая врасплох вашим вопросом, не сразу находит слова для ответа.{/n} "Вокс-система функционирует без нарушений, никто из экипажа не сообщал о проблемах связи... Прошу, позвольте мне провести калибровку системы в вашем присутствии — у вас не останется сомнений в ее исправности".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find the words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning without fault, and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew. Please allow me to run the system calibration in your presence, and it will clear any doubts you may have about the system's performance."

"Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. Please allow me to run the system calibration in your presence, and it will clear any doubts you may have about the system's performance."

It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Votre question prend la maîtresse-vox au dépourvu et il lui faut un moment pour reprendre ses esprits.{/n} « Le système-vox fonctionne correctement et l'équipage n'a signalé aucun problème de communication. Laissez-moi vérifier les paramètres de calibrage système devant vous pour dissiper tout malentendu concernant ses performances. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Votre question prend la maîtresse-vox au dépourvu et il lui faut un moment pour reprendre ses esprits.{/n} « Le système-vox fonctionne correctement et l'équipage n'a signalé aucun problème de communication. Laissez-moi vérifier les paramètres de calibrage système devant vous pour dissiper tout malentendu concernant ses performances. »

languages.text: “舰长大人……”{n}音阵大师被你的问题弄得猝不及防，过了一会儿才想好该如何回答你。{/n}“音阵系统目前在正常运行，操作员们没有发现任何通讯问题……请允许我当着您的面检查系统的校准设置，以减轻您相关的担忧。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人……”{n}音阵大师被你的问题弄得猝不及防，过了一会儿才想好该如何回答你。{/n}“音阵系统目前在正常运行，操作员们没有发现任何通讯问题……请允许我当着您的面检查系统的校准设置，以消除您相关的担忧。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Deine Frage überrumpelt die Voxmeisterin. Sie braucht einen Augenblick, um die richtigen Worte zu finden.{/n} "Das Voxsystem funktioniert wie erwartet, die Crew hat keinerlei Kommunikationsprobleme gemeldet ... Bitte gestattet mir, die Kalibrierungseinstellungen des Systems in Eurem Beisein zu überprüfen, um jede Sorge auszuräumen, die Ihr hinsichtlich seiner Funktionsfähigkeit haben könntet."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain ..." {n}Deine Frage überrumpelt die Voxmeisterin. Sie braucht einen Augenblick, um die richtigen Worte zu finden.{/n} "Das Voxsystem funktioniert wie erwartet, die Crew hat keinerlei Kommunikationsprobleme gemeldet ... Bitte gestattet mir, die Kalibrierungseinstellungen des Systems in Eurem Beisein zu überprüfen, um jede Sorge auszuräumen, die Ihr hinsichtlich seiner Funktionsfähigkeit haben könntet."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}Tu pregunta coge por sorpresa a la maestra de vocos. Le lleva un momento saber qué decir.{/n} «El sistema de vocos funciona a la perfección y la tripulación no ha avisado de ningún problema de comunicación... Comprobaré los ajustes de calibrado del sistema en su presencia para que esté segur{mf|o|a} de su correcto funcionamiento».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán...». {n}Tu pregunta coge por sorpresa a la maestra de vocos. Le lleva un momento saber qué decir.{/n} «El sistema de vocos funciona a la perfección y la tripulación no ha avisado de ningún problema de comunicación... Comprobaré los ajustes de calibrado del sistema en su presencia para que esté segur{mf|o|a} de su correcto funcionamiento».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}ヴォクスマスターはあなたの質問に驚いた様子で、言葉を見つけるのに少し時間がかかった。{/n}「ヴォクス・システムは期待どおりに機能しており、クルーからの通信問題の報告はありません…システムのキャリブレーション設定を陛下の立ち会いのもとで確認させていただき、性能に関する不安を解消させていただければと存じます」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン…」{n}ヴォクスマスターはあなたの質問に驚いた様子で、言葉を見つけるのに少し時間がかかった。{/n}「ヴォクス・システムは期待どおりに機能しており、クルーからの通信問題の報告はありません…システムのキャリブレーション設定を陛下の立ち会いのもとで確認させていただき、性能に関する不安を解消させていただければと存じます」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan." {n}Voks Üstadı, sorun karşısında hazırlıksız yakalanmışa benziyor. Doğru sözcükleri bulması biraz zaman alıyor.{/n} "Voks sistemi beklendiği şekilde çalışıyor, hiçbir tayfamız da iletişim sorunu rapor etmedi. Lütfen performansı konusundaki endişelerinizi giderebilmem adına huzurunuzda sistemin kalibrasyon ayarlarını kontrol etmeme izin verin."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain..." {n}The Vox Master is caught off guard by your question. It takes her a moment to find her words.{/n} "The vox-system is functioning as expected and no communication problems have been reported by any of the crew... Please allow me to check the system's calibration settings in your presence to alleviate any concerns you may have about its performance."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan." {n}Voks Üstadı sorun karşısında hazırlıksız yakalanmış gibi görünüyor. Doğru sözcükleri bulması biraz zaman alıyor.{/n} "Voks sistemi beklendiği şekilde çalışıyor ve hiçbir tayfamız iletişim sorunu rapor etmedi. Lütfen performansı konusundaki endişelerinizi giderebilmem adına huzurunuzda sistemin kalibrasyon ayarlarını kontrol etmeme izin verin."
